snippet: Charlie Crist, a former Republican who was Florida’s governor from 2007 to 2011, formally announced that he would run for the job again, this time as a Democrat.
abstract: Charlie Crist, former Republican who was Florida’s governor from 2007 to 2011, formally announces that he will run for the job again, this time as a Democrat.

byline.original: By LANCE SPEERE and LIZETTE ALVAREZ
byline.contributor: Lance Speere reported from St. Petersburg, and Lizette Alvarez from Miami.

lead_paragraph: Charlie Crist, a former Republican who was Florida’s governor from 2007 to 2011, formally announced that he would run for the job again, this time as a Democrat.

headline.main: Crist, Former Florida Governor, Tosses Hat in Ring Again
headline.print_headline: Florida’s Ex-Governor Tosses Hat in Ring Again
